name: Zodiamat Magic Mind Reader
description:
This program was created in the back rooms of the Outreach Hall. 

The smell of damp wetsuits and dusty chipboard inspired the maker to type this out on a bulky Hewlitt-Packard with a filthy yellowing mouse. 

A loosely collected brick-of-a-book, the glue brittle and the spine peeling, instructed the scout on the inclusion of magick for windows '95.

After it was presented to Akela, the scout earned his Psy Ops badge, level one. 

♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅ ♅

This game runs on Twine v2.3.10 (SugarCube v2.35.0).
